channel.title: Burnside\\Eco&pvp server//317 textures loading 633 anims!
channel.description:
[size=14pt]hi you can call me ping :) [/size] this is my first post don't be hatin u know what they say if you have nothing nice to say don't say it at all! the reason i am releasing this is because i can't host rsps's on my modem sadly so i thought i'd work on a project and get someone else to host for me but that didn't work out so well :\ so i thought i could just release it to you guys! the server is insidiax based alright so i hope you like it.
if you want to help me by hosting the server go to [url=http://burnsidepvp.weebly.com/]http://burnsidepvp.weebly.com/[/url]
[X] 20 downloads [X] 50 downloads [X] 100 downloads [] 150 downloads Help me reach my goal of 150 downloads!
[size=10pt]new stuff added and or fixed include :[/size] [size=12pt]fixed godwars dungeon glitch fixed some command glitches added new shops fixed ::help zone glitch's fixed stats disconnect glitch added noob friendly readme.text semi tutorial on cache moved all of the shops and alot of the npc's fixed a few makeover mage glitches other minors that i cant think of at the top of my head also[/size]
[size=14pt]some of the Burnside features include:[/size]
[size=12pt] dragon claws spec works all godsword specs donator zone donator benefits working pk point system staff zone pk point shops summoning very nice pking perfect switching prayer works 100% working duel arena working godwars dungeoneering working fight pits dfs charging working player owned shops webclient ready no dupes at all working hand cannon auto casting 317 textures ::help zone korasi spec working pvp armours working barrages working slayer easy to code and customize source and client [/size]
pictures : [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic6.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic7.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic9.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic10.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic11.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1053.photobucket.com/albums/s468/pingisme/rune-serverpic12.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]thank you so much for reading this i hope you liked it and downloaded it! i didn't have much time to make the background as you can see so that's why its a gay paint background ha ha feel free to repost this just remember to give me (ping) some credit![/size]
[size=14pt]credits :
me = 25% (coding much of the source and client and fixing bugs) abstract pk = 15% (for using their source) insidiaX = 60% (for their amazing client and cache i couldnt have done it without them!)[/size]
DOWNLOAD CLIENT & SOURCE PACKAGE : [url=http://uppit.com/nf4gdsa80jug/Burnside_package!.rar]http://uppit.com/nf4gdsa80jug/Burnside_package!.rar[/url] DOWNLOAD CACHE : [url=http://uppit.com/juxr5vikeeg7/Burnside_cache.rar]http://uppit.com/juxr5vikeeg7/Burnside_cache.rar[/url]
(if you have any problems or need help with the client or the source pm me or if you reply on here i will try and get back to you but if you just send me a pm its probably gonna be the quickest way to get help i have teamviewer and skype email etc. so i will help you!)

[size=14pt]hi you can call me ping [/size]
this is my first post don’t be hatin u know what they say if you have nothing nice to say don’t say it at all! the reason i am releasing this is because i can’t host rsps’s on my modem sadly so i thought i’d work on a project and get someone else to host for me but that didn’t work out so well :\ so i thought i could just release it to you guys!
the server is insidiax based alright so i hope you like it.
